text: te loko manthi tum je lokone pana potana avaja vade pathabhrasta kari sake kari le ane temana para potana savara ane madada karanara'one cadhavi de ane temanum dhana ane santana manthi potano pana bhaga therava ane te lokone (juththa) vacano apa, te lokone jetala vacano setana kare che, spasta dhoko che
